content:
User: Miscommunication on Scope: The prompt said “tag the entire transcript chunk provided,” but if only part of the transcript was in the placeholder, DeepSearch tagged what it had.

Grok: From its thinking notes, DeepSearch is also confused—it’s wondering if there’s a file attachment with the full 14 interactions that it couldn’t access. But since you pasted the text directly, it’s likely the interface truncated your input.
